spatial_accuracy.notes: General floor plan layout is followed, but there are significant discrepancies in door orientations and window placements. The main entrance doors (double door at bottom) are rendered as a single door with different framing.

structural_fidelity.notes: Adjacency is mostly maintained, but the kitchen area (bottom left) has been transformed into a bedroom hallucination. Wall thicknesses are inconsistent near the balconies.

furniture_mapping.notes: Extreme deviation in the bottom-left room where a large bed replaces the kitchen island and cabinets. Furniture scale in the living area is slightly undersized compared to the plan.

aesthetic_quality.notes: High visual clarity and excellent orthographic-style projection. Lighting and geometry are clean with no significant rendering artifacts.

detected_errors.description: Kitchen at bottom-left is hallucinated as a bedroom with a bed.
Double entrance doors at the bottom center are rendered as a single leaf door.
Living room sofa configuration differs from the 2D layout (central coffee table missing/replaced).
The swing direction of internal doors in the top-right bedroom/en-suite does not match the plan.
The left balcony proportions appear elongated relative to the bedroom it adjoins.
